entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
